### Static Site Generator

This website was made with [Quarto](https://quarto.org) v.{{< version >}}. Quarto v.1.4 (and later) is licensed under the [MIT License](https://github.com/quarto-dev/quarto-cli/blob/main/COPYRIGHT).\
More information in [Quarto License page](https://quarto.org/license.html).

### Vector and icons

The Hanko stamp used as logo of this website was made with [HankoPress service](https://web-hanko.jp/en). Terms of Use can be found in this [link](https://web-hanko.jp/en/policy).

The pattern on top and bottom of my digital business card was designed using [Pi SVG Vector](https://www.svgrepo.com/svg/368123/pi) by [Stephenhutchings](https://github.com/stephenhutchings/typicons.font?ref=svgrepo.com) in PD License via [SVG Repo](https://www.svgrepo.com/).

The background pattern used in the Home Page was made by [Joost van der Schee](https://www.usecue.com/blog/a-changed-pattern/).

### Fonts

The serif font family used is [Charter](https://practicaltypography.com/charter.html). Here is the [link](https://practicaltypography.com/charter.html) to the page where the file and the original license can be accessed due to [Matthew Butterick](https://matthewbutterick.com/) efforts.

The sans-serif font family used is [CooperHewitt](https://www.cooperhewitt.org/open-source-at-cooper-hewitt/cooper-hewitt-the-typeface-by-chester-jenkins/) by [Cooper Hewitt Smithsonian Design Museum](https://www.cooperhewitt.org/) and is licensed under the [SIL Open Font License](https://github.com/cooperhewitt/cooperhewitt-typeface/blob/master/files/-CooperHewitt-OFL-201406.txt).

The monospace font family used is [mononoki](https://madmalik.github.io/mononoki/) by [Matthias Tellen](https://github.com/madmalik) and is licensed under the [SIL Open Font License](https://github.com/madmalik/mononoki/blob/main/LICENSE).

### Color Palette

The color palette used in this website was based on [Flexoki](https://stephango.com/flexoki) color scheme.\
Flexoki was made by [Steph Ango](https://stephango.com/) and is licensed under the [MIT License](https://github.com/kepano/flexoki/blob/main/LICENSE).
